You can review your 2SV settings to make changes. You can also see security activity at https://myaccount.google.com/notifications You received this email to let you know about important changes to your Google Account and services. © 2025 Google LLC, 1600 Amphitheatre Parkway, Mountain View, CA 94043, USA
